thread.title: A moment of your time to help some friends.

post.author: New Horizon
post.body:
I have some friends who are competing to be guests on Pete Tongs DJ MUSIC show. They're a couple of talented local DJ's and it would be really great if they were able to win a lucky break like this. They're just two guys from a tiny Island in Canada, and this could really help them get some much needed attention.

If you have a second to help out and vote, I would appreciate it.

Vote for 03. Jakt & Jeff Math 'Mules' at http://www.fasttrax.tv

There's a widget at the bottom.
If you care not to vote blindly, they have a myspace with music samples. http://www.myspace.com/jaktandjeffmath

Thanks for the help!

post.author: kat
post.body: voted 3 although 2 was good as well
